text: No certificate for share or membership capital shall be issued until the par value thereof has been paid for in full. A full or condensed statement of the requirements of §§ 29-913, 29-914, 29-915, and 29-927 shall be printed upon each certificate issued by an association.
historical:

Legislative History of Laws

Editor's Notes

Former § 29-925 has been recodified as § 29A-925.

DC CODE § 29-925

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Share and membership certificates; issuance and contents.
